subject: Error in executing stored procedure ORA-00942: table or view does not exist
msgSnippet: Hi All, we are executing Junit test cases from ANT script. The most of the test cases are passed but few of them failed due to the following error message.
messageBody:
Hi All,
we are executing Junit test cases from ANT script. The
most of the test cases are passed but few of them
failed due to the following error message.

Error in executing stored procedure ORA-00942: table
or view does not exist

Actions we have taken to resolve this problem,

1. we have asked DBA people to restart the DB server
(As a result, all test cases are passed. But this is
not permanent solution as sometimes we are getting the
same error).


Few more points,
1.There is no DDL operation performed against database
while we are executing test cases.
2.Only one user is connected to the particular
schema(Database schema) (No other users are connected)

Could you please give me some tips on how to resolve
this problem?


Thanks & Regards,
K.Barath
